page.title: 06H.A.R.T. (RUSHBURY.)
page.content: {Highwood Agroforestry Research Trust . There are{15}members working on the {farm (20 acres)}and{forest (20 acres). Other people are{connected}with the {Trust. } Those who live on the farm give all{ their{time}for{nothing.Nobody}receives {wages. {All}land is used for{aims}of the{Trust and not for{personal gain.All machines, buildings, tools, books belong to the{Trust}and not to any person. The aim of{H.A.R.T.}is to make it possible for{people}to return to the land,and therefore the{land}to the people. {Animals on the farm:}Jacob's sheep, chickens, Tamworth pigs, piglets Guernsey Cow, calf, goats,geese. Farming is done organically to keep the land good.
